thread.title: Savannah-Chatham police seek suspect in Duffy Street sexual assault
thread.title_full: Savannah-Chatham police seek suspect in Duffy Street sexual assault | savannahnow.com

author: Savannah Morning News
title: Savannah-Chatham police seek suspect in Duffy Street sexual assault
text:
By Savannah Morning News
The Criminal Investigations Division of Savannah-Chatham police is investigating a sexual assault reported on the 100 block of West Duffy Street early Wednesday morning.
The victim is a female in her 20s, said Eunicia Baker, Savannah-Chatham police spokeswoman. About 6 a.m. an unknown male subject reportedly entered the victimâ€™s residence and sexually assaulted her at gunpoint, Baker said.
The suspect is described as a black male with a dark complexion, standing about 5 feet 6 inches to 5 feet 7 inches tall and weighing roughly 140-160 pounds. The suspect appears to be in his early 30s. He wore a long sleeve shirt, camouflage pants and rust-colored work boots during the encounter, Baker said.
Anyone with information on this case should call CrimeStoppers at 912-234-2020 or text CRIMES (274637) using the keyword CSTOP2020. Tipsters remain anonymous and may qualify for a cash reward.
A confidential tip line also is open directly to investigators at 912-525-3124.
